modName: Shadow Slayer - increased two handed sneak attack
summary: Increases two handed sneak attack to 3x, 4x or 5x (works with all 2H swords, 2H axes and 2H maces).
descriptionHtml:
As the title says, this little mod increases two handed sneak attack to 3x, 4x, or 5x (the default is 2x).
I.e. there are three files to choose from: shadow_slayer_3x.esp, shadow_slayer_4x.esp, shadow_slayer_5x.esp.

Works with all 2-handed swords, 2-handed axes and 2-handed maces.

I.e. no more discrimination for two-handed thieves!

-----

As of now, this little tweak feels like a cheat (there are no prerequisites, you just tick the mod in the data files and you\'re set). Once the CK comes out, I intend to transfer this into a regular perk.
author: Jenistos
